summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Personal Finance Management System for Iranian users. All backend APIs working correctly with Persian data support and Jalali calendar integration. Frontend UI fully functional with proper RTL layout, Persian text rendering, and complete CRUD operations for accounts, transactions, and checks.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just status code inconsistency

configuration_issues.issue: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL was pointing to non-working Railway URL
configuration_issues.fix_applied: Updated to use localhost:8001 for testing

passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint
Get categories with Persian labels
Create bank account with Persian name (بانک ملت)
Get all accounts with balance calculation
Create income transaction with Jalali date (1403/08/15)
Create expense transaction with Persian category (خوراک)
Get all transactions with account details
Create check with Persian description
Get all checks with status filtering
Dashboard stats calculation with Persian month names
Dashboard chart data generation
Frontend dashboard page loads with Persian stats cards
Navigation between all pages (داشبورد, حساب‌ها, تراکنش‌ها, چک‌ها, گزارش‌ها)
Account creation form with Persian bank name (بانک پاسارگاد)
Transaction creation form with Jalali date input
Check creation form with Persian description
Reports page with Chart.js integration
RTL layout working correctly (dir='rtl')
Persian font rendering (Vazirmatn)
All CRUD operations functional
Real-time data updates across pages
